Hero.name: HAMENNI Rayan
Hero.description: I create elegant and high-performance digital solutions with special attention to details and user experience.

About.phrase1: Graduate of the University of Béjaïa, I am passionate about software development and artificial intelligence, with a strong drive to deliver innovative and efficient solutions.
About.phrase2: I am proficient in several frameworks and technologies, and I can quickly adapt to new technical environments.
About.phrase3: Curious and motivated, I constantly strive to expand my skills and turn ideas into impactful, high-value projects.

Skills.title: My Skills
Skills.phrase: Technologies and tools I use to build efficient and scalable solutions

projects.title: My Projects
projects.phrase1: A selection of my recent work, combining elegant design with strong technical performance.
projects.description1: A web application for managing shipping, allowing tracking of orders, trucks, products, and pallets.
projects.description2: A web application for automatic management of thesis defenses, enabling smart jury scheduling, room assignment, student management, and timeslot tracking.
projects.description3: A simple and professional showcase website for the Kussor Real Estate agency, presenting their services and contact information.
projects.description4: An intelligent web application that records meetings, generates automatic transcription, clear summaries, and AI-generated task lists. [in progress]
